name: Blood Loss Toss (1 Hour Project)
description:
This game was developed for Weekly Hour Game Jam - W21 2017.

The theme was "Less is more".  To build a foundation on that theme, I chose to have a game where less health means more firepower- or in this case, more BLOOD power.

Bleed on your enemies to prolong your survival!

WASD - Movement

Arrows - Directional bleeding attack

Spacebar - Take intentional damage

Want to support my free games?  I sell merchandise featuring characters and designs from some of my most well received games. Every purchase helps me to not starve on my way to releasing my next game!
